about_the_game:
AEK973 First Release Package!
Equip yourself with the very first AEK973 skin series.

[PACKAGE LIST]
AEK973 GL GREY WOLF (permanent)
AEK973 GL (permanent)

*AEK973 GL GREY WOLF is exclusive.
*This package is only available until 2018.

name: Black Squad - AEK973 FIRST RELEASE PACKAGE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.2GHZ / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR GT630 / RADEON HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: AEK973 First Release Package! Equip yourself with the very first AEK973 skin series.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Thai, Turkish, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
